titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig & Jenny Johnson

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Office for Religious Life, records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Stanford University. Office for Religious Life

did.abstract: The materials consist of administrative files, event programs and audiorecordings, publications, course materials, and videorecordings documenting activities of the Office for Religious Life.

accessrestrict.head: Access to Collection
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the University Archivist, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Stanford University, Office for Religious Life, Records (SC1057). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from the Office for Religious Life, 2011-2016.

arrangement.head: Arrangement

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of administrative files, event programs and audiorecordings, publications, course materials, and videorecordings documenting activities of the Office for Religious Life.
